structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXI. PROTECTION OF PERSONS DISCLOSING SPECIFIED INFORMATION

text.section:
Sec. 2-967.8. Relief.
In any case brought under this article in which the County Manager or any other appropriate public authority finds that the person has been subjected to an adverse action in violation of this article, the Manager may:
Refer the matter to the appropriate department head for appropriate disciplinary action, if any;
Compensate the person, if appropriate, for the lost income, benefits or other lost remuneration caused by the adverse action.
